meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed cymosely, one after the other.
meanings.sent2: She arranged the books cymosely on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The students lined up cymosely for the school photo.

meanings.sent5: The leaves fell cymosely from the tree, dancing in the wind.

meanings.definition: Having the form of a cyme
meanings.sent1: The plant displayed cymosely shaped clusters of flowers.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace was adorned with cymosely designed pendants.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with cymosely arranged berries.
meanings.sent4: The clouds formed a cymosely pattern in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a cymosely structured mountain landscape.
